Plot Summary: Buck, a half German Shepard half Saint Bernard who's life is 
pretty peaceful and happy living with the MillersÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ in California. However, one 
day he is tricked and sold off. He ends up in the snowy North where he has

and he has to fight for his own survival.
